p: Numerous management strategies exist for AT, such as rest, physiotherapy with eccentric strengthening exercises, 7 extracorporeal shockwave therapy, 8 dry needling, 8 high-volume injections 8 and platelet-rich plasmaÂ (PRP) injections. 9 However, apart from eccentric loading exercises none of these therapies has been shown to be more effective than placebo. 8 8
